channel.title: Weather at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL - via NOAA's National Weather Service

item.title: Thunderstorm in Vicinity Light Rain Fog/Mist and 61 F at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL
item.description: Winds are South at 11.5 MPH (10 KT). The pressure is 1004.2 mb and the humidity is 93%. The wind chill is 59. Last Updated on Apr 9 2015, 10:52 am CDT.
